summary.span: 表示解碼器所傳回和編碼器所接受的影像資料。

span.span: Represents image data returned by a decoder and accepted by encoders.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供額外的功能，未定義藉由提供存取映像的特定畫面格相關聯。 provides additional functionality not defined by by providing access to the associated with a particular frame of an image. 也支援使用的中繼資料資訊寫入屬性或方法。 also supports the writing of metadata information by using the property or the method. 任何傳回始終凍結的解碼器。Any returned from a decoder is always frozen. 如果您需要的可修改複本，您必須先建立一份使用方法。If you require a modifiable copy, you must first create a copy of the by using the method. 只有[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)]格式映像支援多個框架。Only [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)] format images support multiple frames. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立新使用。The following code example demonstrates how to create a new by using a . [!code-csharp[bitmapframeexample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitmapFrameExample/CSharp/BitmapFrame.cs#1)] [!code-vb[bitmapframeexample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitmapFrameExample/VB/BitmapFrame.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用物件，以開啟[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)]圖形和寫入的中繼資料，使用方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the object to open a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] graphic and write metadata by using the method. [!code-cpp[bitmapmetadata#SetQuery](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitMapMetadata/CPP/BitmapMetadata.cpp#setquery)] [!code-csharp[bitmapmetadata#SetQuery](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitMapMetadata/CSharp/BitmapMetadata.cs#setquery)] [!code-vb[bitmapmetadata#SetQuery](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BitMapMetadata/VB/BitmapMetadata.vb#setquery)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `bitmapStream`之後建立框架時，才可以關閉使用快取選項。The `bitmapStream` can be closed after the frame is created only when the cache option is used. 預設值快取選項會保留資料流，直到需要為止的框架。The default cache option retains the stream until the frame is needed. 使用方法，以指定建立並快取選項。Use the method to specify create and cache options.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用快取選項，如果您想要關閉`bitmapStream`建立點陣圖之後。Use the cache option if you wish to close the `bitmapStream` after the bitmap is created. 預設值快取選項保留資料流的存取權，直到需要點陣圖，並清除作業由記憶體回收行程。The default cache option retains access to the stream until the bitmap is needed and cleanup is handled by the garbage collector.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Lze přidat，pouze 的中繼資料，或使用編輯如果映像檔包含足夠的空間，新的中繼資料; 否則中繼資料可以使用新增屬性。Metadata can only be added or edited using the if the image file contains enough room for the new metadata; otherwise, metadata can be added using the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用物件，以開啟[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)]圖形和寫入的中繼資料，使用方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the object to open a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] graphic and write metadata by using the method.
